titles.title: To increase the fee for the enforcement of the Tea Importation Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: 7/30/1993--Introduced. Amends the Tea Importation Act to prohibit the examination of tea for importation into the United States, or its release by the Collector of Customs, unless the importer or consignee has paid a fee of ten cents for each hundred weight or fraction thereof of such tea.
